name: Cannonball Commander Free
description:
Cannonball Commander is a fun pirate themed game where you shoot a cannonball into a barrel. Cannonball Commander is fun, challenging, and addicting to play. Use the up and down arrows to aim the cannon and then touch the "Fire" button to shoot. In some levels you will need to adjust the amount of power you use to shoot the cannon. The goal of the game is to get the cannonball into the barrel to unlock the next level. The levels have objects that can effect the cannonball.

+ Fun pirate theme
+ Many obstacles like ships, swords and hooks
+ Physics based game
+ Fun for all ages
